attributes.action: Stop Owen Paterson allowing GMO crops in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
GMO crops have been proven to use even more pesticide and be harmful to our health, not to mention the environment.

Big GMO companies like Monsanto won't even lable foods which have there "amazing" product in and WHY? America have been fighting hundreds of legal battles with them and France did some amazing research about the health effects of GMOS. LOOK IT UP

Sign up and stop our country being infected by GMOs before its too late.
